name: Embrace of the Downpour
description:
"Embrace of the Downpour" is a psychological horror experience set in a lonely apartment, where you play as Wesley Smith. In what could have been another calm evening, things take an unexpected turn. Will he live to see the next day?

Key features:
  • Must be finished in one sitting.
  • Contains jumpscares.
  • Atmospheric graphics.
  • Can be finished in about 30 minutes.
